moves.4... Nxd5 5. e4 Nxc3 6. bxc3 Bg7 7. Nf3:
cxd4 adalah langkah teori, sekarang si Marcel justru mengabaikan Ratunya yang  bertengger di sayap lain tanpa kerjaan.

Cxd4 was suggested move, Black aggresive f pawn move left Black' Queen stay uncoordinated at Queenside, for whole game, and also his weakness later.
moves.12. dxc5 fxe4:
serangan yang mungkin cukup berguna sekarang bidak Putih menjadi tak sedap dan rajanya cukup terekpos.

Black's pawn attack looks ok as White's pawn structure now a bit shattered and the King looks exposed.
moves.13. Nd4 Bd7:
seandainya 13..Ne5 masih lebih tajam mengancam Nd3+

But 13..Ne5 more sharper in attacking the White king which haven't castling yet.
moves.14. Be2 O-O-O:
terlalu riskan mengumpankan Raja ke sayap di mana lawan punya kekuatan penuh, tukaran Kuda masih lebih positional.

And this is looks obscured to put a King right to the area where enemy's pieces and pawn right in front of it.
moves.15. Nb3 Qa4 16. O-O:
sekarang posisi Raja putih aman dan terkendali

White take times to secure the King which is now completely safe.
moves.16... Ne5 17. Bd4 Bf6 18. Rcb1 Bf5 19. Q:
19.c6! langsung merobek pertahanan Hitam

19.c6! is more straight forward and sharp.
moves.19... Nc6: kesalahan fatal / blunder, 19..Nd3 20.Bxd3 exd3 21.c6 Qxc6 masih aman / still safe.
moves.20. Bxf6:
tujuan untuk membebaskan petak d4 buat si Kuda

the aims is to free d4 square for the Knight.
moves.20... exf6 21. Nd4 Rd7 22. Bd1:
1-0 karena Hitam Ratu ke a6, Putih menang perwira dengan 23.Nd4xc6 dan 23 ... b7xc6?? mat dengan 24.Qb8#

1-0 because 22..Qa6 23.Nxc6 bxc6? 24.Qb#, White at least win a piece.
